mean_cn: n. 著作，写作；  adj. 写的，写作的
mean_en: a group of pieces of writing, especially by a particular person or on a particular subject
word_etyma: writ=write写作+ing名词后缀 → 著作,作品
short_phrase: the writings of a famous author and a skull
sentence: I've collected all the writings of Shakespeare.
sentence_trans: 我已经收集了莎士比亚的所有作品。
